paramInformation.label: Delayed OFF time
paramInformation.description: time in seconds to delay OFF

paramInformation.label: Panic ON time
paramInformation.description: Time in seconds for panic mode ON

paramInformation.label: Panic OFF time
paramInformation.description: time in seconds for OFF in panic mode

paramInformation.label: Basic Set Value
paramInformation.description: Send value to association group on trigger

paramInformation.label: Power Up State
paramInformation.description: Power Up State of the switch

paramInformation.label: Panic mode enable
paramInformation.description: Enables this switch to participate in panic mode

paramInformation.label: Dimmer Ramp Time
paramInformation.description: Time in seconds to reach desired level

paramInformation.label: Kickstart / Rapid Start
paramInformation.description: Turn on or off rapid start feature

paramInformation.label: Forward Z-Wave Commands
paramInformation.description: Keep associated accessory switches in sync

paramInformation.description: The minimum dim level the switch will allow

paramInformation.description: The maximum dim level the switch will allow
